mng: foreign (non-Chinese), barbarian, classifier for occurrences (of an event, action or speech utterance), classifier for iterations: times, -fold (as in twofold etc), classifier for situations: kind, sort

exm.mng: Zhenpan commandery (108 BC-c. 300 AD), one of four Han dynasty commanderies in north Korea
to double, to increase by a certain number of times
